name: Move
description: Move an object on the ground.

name: Wish
description: Restore 80 HP to the whole party.

name: Wish Well
description: Restore 160 HP to the whole party.

name: Pure Wish
description: Restore 400 HP to the whole party.

name: Plasma
description: Attack with a barrage of bolts.

name: Shine Plasma
description: Attack with a barrage of bolts.

name: Slash
description: Attack with a blade of focused air.

name: Wind Slash
description: Attack with a blade of focused air.

name: Sonic Slash
description: Attack with a blade of focused air.

name: Planet Diver
description: Leap skyward and lunge onto a foe.

name: Kirin
description: A mystical beast cloaked in flame.

name: Cybele
description: The great mother of the earth.

name: Neptune
description: An incarnation of the sea king.

name: Boreas
description: The god of the north wind.

name: Flint
description: Strike a blow that can cleave stone.

name: Sap
description: Attack a foe and steal HP.

name: Forge
description: Boost party Attack with flame's fury.

name: Fever
description: Wrap a foe in feverish delusion.

name: Corona
description: Boost party Defense with a heat aura.

name: Scorch
description: Stun a foe with a blast attack.

name: Zephyr
description: Boost party Agility with swift wind.

name: Smog
description: Veil a foe's vision in smoke.
